categories: Category:Imperial Army personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Korus was a male Human who served in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War with the Galactic Republic. He was stationed aboard Vaiken Spacedock.
Korus appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as the PvP Weapons vendor for Imperial players on Vaiken Spacedock.
